Japanese text: foo
English text: bar

Japanese text: 俺の名前はあああぁああ。ここ、私立きらめき高校の新入生だ。
English text: My name is Aaahhhh. I am a new student at Kirameki Private High School.

Japanese text: 無理だと思っていた第一志望だったが、選良く合格することができた。
English text: I was thinking it was impossible, but I was able to pass my first choice.

Japanese text: 最高の気分だぜ。密かに想っている、藤崎詩織と同じ学校に入学できたんだから。
English text: I'm in the best mood. Because I was able to secretly enter the same school as Shiori Fujisaki, who I have feelings for.

Japanese text: 実は．．．。彼女とは小学校からの幼なじみで、家も隣りどうしなんだけれど．．．
English text: Actually... She and I have been childhood friends since elementary school, and our houses are next to each other...

Japanese text: 密かに想っている、藤崎詩織と同じ学校に入学できたんだから。
English text: I was able to enter the same school as Shiori Fujisaki, who I secretly have feelings for.

Japanese text: 俺と比べて、月とスッポン。だから、いまだに友達以上の関係には．．．。
English text: "Compared to me, the moon and a soft-shelled turtle. That's why we still have a relationship that's more than just friends..."

Japanese text: よう。何しけた面してんだよ。
English text: Hello. What kind of expression do you have on your face?

Japanese text: 俺、早乙女好雄。これからよ
English text: I'm Yoshio Saotome. Nice to meet you!

Japanese text: あ、あぁ．．．。別に．．．。くなわなわしい奴だなぁ．．．。
English text: Ah, um... It's nothing really... Just a troublesome person...

Japanese text: 俺、早乙女好雄。これからよろしくな。お前は何でいうんだ？
English text: Nice to meet you, Hayao Otome. How can I address you?

Japanese text: 俺は、あああぁぁぁ．．．こっちこそよろしくな。
English text: I am, aaahhhh... Nice to meet you too.

Japanese text: あっ、
English text: こんにちは！英語に翻訳したいテキストをお教えください。

Japanese text: 俺の名前はあああぁぁあ．．．ここ、私立きらめき高
English text: My name is Aaaah... Here, Private Kirameki High.

Japanese text: 俺は、ああぁあああ。こっちこそよろしくな。
English text: I am, aaahhhh. Nice to meet you too.

Japanese text: あっ、来たわよ。
English text: Oh, you're here.

Japanese text: 素敵〜。
English text: Lovely~

Japanese text: 何だ？急に女子が好きだしたぞ。
English text: What's going on? Suddenly you started liking girls.

Japanese text: やあ、諸君。待たせたね。
English text: Hello, everyone. I made you all wait, didn't I?

Japanese text: この僕の事を知らない者は、いないと思うが．．．。僕が理事長の孫の伊集院レイだ。
English text: I don't think there's anyone who doesn't know me, but... I'm Ijuin Rei, the chairman's grandson.

Japanese text: 同じクラスの男性諸君には悪いが．．．。ま、仲良くやっていこうじゃないか。
English text: I'm sorry to the male classmates in the same class... Well, let's get along, shall we?

Japanese text: 伊集院って、あの金持ちのか．．．。嫌なクラスになっちまったなぁ。
English text: Isshukan is that rich person... Became part of an unpleasant class.
